text:
Good morning from Yokosuka! It's a chilly winter morning with a gentle breeze. New Year Events in Kurihama (Yokosuka) are happening now! Join Joya-no-Kane, Hatsumode, First Sunrise & Dondoyaki celebrations this afternoon.
Check the official page for more info: https://ja-yokosukahayama.or.jp/tourism/ (New Year Events in Kurihama (Yokosuka): Joya-no-Kane, Hatsumode, First Sunrise & Dondoyaki (2025–2026))

tomorrow.weather_text_ja: 晴れ　夕方　から　くもり
